description: Explore the evolving role of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) in cyberwarfare, focusing on their potential impact on digital conflict, secure attribution, and open-source innovation. This article examines the intersection of NFTs with national defense strategies, highlighting both the opportunities and challenges they present within the realms of security and psychological operations.
keywords: NFTs, cyberwarfare, digital conflict, open source, national defense, security, psychological operations, information warfare, blockchain technology, military innovation
title: The Role of NFTs in Cyberwarfare: Harnessing Openness in Digital Conflict
